prompt:
Create a product hero image identical in style to how Lock & Lock, Milton, or Borosil photograph their clear storage containers on Amazon India.

The product to photograph: A clear PET storage jar with a blue lid. Reference [jars] for the exact jar body (middle column, top — the 'Blossoms' blue floral print) and [lids] for the exact blue Pavisha embossed lid (top-right position).

The visual result I need — describe exactly what the final image looks like:

- The jar floats against a PURE WHITE background — completely white, no shadows on the background, no gray, no gradient, clinical Amazon-style white
- Both sides of the jar have THIN BRIGHT WHITE LINES running along the edges — like glowing white contour lines that separate the clear plastic from the white background. These bright edge highlights are the signature of premium clear container photography.
- The jar sits on a surface with a soft, clean REFLECTION visible beneath it — like a mirror that fades to white
- The blue lid has visible embossed PAVISHA text with small shadows in every letter groove, giving it dimensional depth
- The blue floral Blossoms artwork is VIVID and ELECTRIC — saturated blues that pop off the screen
- The PET plastic looks crystal clear — you can see the back-side print faintly through the front wall
- The overall feel is PREMIUM, COMMERCIAL, TRUSTWORTHY — not artistic, not lifestyle, not rustic. Pure clinical commercial product photography.
- The image is RAZOR SHARP throughout

This is the exact style of image you see when you search 'Milton clear container' or 'Lock & Lock storage jar' on Amazon India.

extraction.target_description: COMPOSE: Blue Pavisha embossed lid (top-right of [lids]) + Blossoms PET jar body (middle-column top of [jars]). Single complete product.

fidelity.preserve_colors: Source colors boosted +20% saturation. Electric vivid blues.
fidelity.preserve_artwork: Blossoms floral print from [jars]. Single continuous wrap.
fidelity.hero_features: Bright white edge contour lines, embossed lid depth, PET clarity

background.color: #FFFFFF pure white — clinical, Amazon-compliant, nothing else

lighting.type: Commercial product photography — the kind that creates bright white edge lines on clear containers
lighting.special_requirements: BRIGHT WHITE CONTOUR LINES along both edges of the jar. Like glowing white highlights tracing the cylindrical silhouette. This is the single most important visual element.

material_treatment.rendering_notes: Crystal clear PET with bright white edge highlights. Back-side art visible through front. Lid: embossed with visible groove shadows.
